description:
A mid-sized shovel to quickly move large amounts of snow. The new shaft cross-section provides greater strength and better grip, and the whole package breaks down small to leave room in your bag for your other backcountry gear.

  • Strong ovo-concave shaft extends and is easy to grip
  • D-grip handle for control and comfort
  • Stompable, flat blade cuts smooth pit walls and penetrates hard debris
  • Packable rectangular-section blade
  • Extended length is 79cm, collapsed length is 61cm
name: Backcountry Access Dozer 2D Shovel
